comment_1:
Elvis Presley, Johnny Cash, Jerry Lee Lewis. Without them we wouldn't have rock today.

This song is incredible.
comment_2: this song is very creepy, & hauting, I love it.
comment_3: A great blues song.  I especially like the reverberated vocals and guitar solo.  My personal favorite by Elvis.
comment_4: I love Elvis. A bit sad considering my fav band is Linkin Park. Well not sad. Scary really :P. Brilliant song, brilliant man
comment_5:
syko, why is it sad to love Elvis, "before Elvis there was nothing"  John Lennon.  Also, without Elvis, you wouldn't have LP.

Anyway, the song is obviously a metphor for being lonley with other lonely people which may make you not so lonley after being dumped.  miserly loves company?
comment_6: I think it's the only song he can ever be credited as co-writing as well.  I wonder which bits he wrote.  Brilliant stuff.
comment_7: John Cale also does a great version of this song. Catch it if you can.
